info.title: Certigna Sign
info.description: A digital signature solution offers robust authentication for electronic documents, ensuring both security and reliability. By utilizing unique digital signatures, it guarantees the integrity and authenticity of digital content. Users can confidently sign files, knowing that their digital signatures provide a secure and trustworthy authentication mechanism.

post.summary: Step 1 - Upload a document to sign
post.description: This operation initiates the project creation process by allowing a file to be uploaded to be signed as the first step.

parameters.name: files
parameters.description: This parameter allows the user to upload the file(s) intended for signing.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Specifies the name of the project for which the file is being uploaded. The project name must be between 30 and 500 characters in length.

parameters.name: step
parameters.description: Indicates the current step of the project creation process. By default, this is set to 1.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Represents the current status of the project. Possible values are 'Pending', 'Processing', or 'Completed'.

parameters.name: isMerge
parameters.description: This flag determines whether the uploaded files should be merged into one file or not.
